column5: Hello everyone.  It's been a while. This summer consisted of less fishing for me being that my wife Anna and I moved in August into our first house. The maddness has since deflated and I'm prime and ready for some great fall fishing.  Summer Pics...  The joys of being a dad       Fish...         My Vessel...       BRING ON FALL!!! My favorite season.  Laszlo
Some great fish pics - even a flying baby! Gotta like it
Love the first pic  Looks like you did not too bad being as busy with the house move and kid as you were

Nice to see someone else using pontoons. I've got a 12ft Dave Scadden fitted for 2 and it absolutely was the best investment I made for fishing outside of fishing with my 13 yr old.  BTW I still remember when my guy was the same age as yours and I would chuck him up as high as yours. Mine just made the scared look everytime I did it. Now he picks me up. enjoy this time.
You had me at the flying baby pic! Fantastic shots and thanks very much for posting... HH
Looked like a great summer!!! Love the flying baby pic too! LOL.
sweet rig... any trout trips down the rivers?
I hope you caught that Superkid.  Cool boat.  Enjoy your fall.
Congrat's on the new house, that's big.  You're girl is a beauty.
Great photos. that LM is a pig!
Not yet but I'm hoping to change that this fall!
Very cool pics Laz.  Sweet pontoon boat. I wonder if you can put a fish finder on it.LOL
Awesome Lasz Loved the pic of your daughter getting airborne
